data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Daejeon, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Daejeon, South Korea
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Daejeon, South Korea to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Daejeon, South Korea.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Daejeon, South Korea to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the South Asian, general people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the South Asian, general people worship before you. For the kingdom of the South Asian, general people is yours.
Father, please raise up prophets in Daejeon who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Daejeon to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Daejeon, South Korea has a population of 1,539,200.

We estimate Daejeon has 251,816 people who might know Jesus, 211,506 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,075,878 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Daejeon to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
